mcq.statement: A sentence has been given in Active/Passive voice. Out of the four alternatives suggested below, select the one which best expresses the same sentence in Passive/Active voice. My parents have done this to help you in your financial crisis.

options.a: This have been done by my parents to help you in your financial crisis.
options.b: This is been done by my parents to help you in your financial crisis.
options.c: This has been done by my parents to help you in your financial crisis.
options.d: This is to be done by my parents to help you in your financial crisis.
